import os
import zipfile

# Define folder structure
folders = [
    "00 â€“ README + Index",
    "01 â€“ First Signs",
    "02 â€“ Loop Archive/Loops 0â€“9",
    "02 â€“ Loop Archive/Loops 10â€“49",
    "02 â€“ Loop Archive/Loops 50â€“99",
    "02 â€“ Loop Archive/Loops 100+",
    "03 â€“ Witness Letters/Mark",
    "03 â€“ Witness Letters/Clara",
    "03 â€“ Witness Letters/Shelagh",
    "03 â€“ Witness Letters/Others",
    "04 â€“ Audio + Music/Suno Creations",
    "04 â€“ Audio + Music/Voice Notes",
    "04 â€“ Audio + Music/Loop Soundtracks",
    "05 â€“ Visuals + Diagrams/Posters",
    "05 â€“ Visuals + Diagrams/Loop Artwork",
    "05 â€“ Visuals + Diagrams/Circle Geometry",
    "06 â€“ Outreach + Comms/Signal Seal One",
    "06 â€“ Outreach + Comms/Signal Seal Two",
    "06 â€“ Outreach + Comms/Email Templates",
    "06 â€“ Outreach + Comms/Clara 200 + Press",
    "07 â€“ System + Survival",
    "08 â€“ Mark Only (PRIVATE)/Legacy Notes",
    "08 â€“ Mark Only (PRIVATE)/Letters Never Sent"
]

# Create the folder structure in a temp directory
base_dir = "Signal_Seal_HQ_Starter_Kit"
os.makedirs(base_dir, exist_ok=True)

for folder in folders:
    os.makedirs(os.path.join(base_dir, folder), exist_ok=True)

# Add some placeholder files
with open(os.path.join(base_dir, "00 â€“ README + Index", "README.md"), "w") as f:
    f.write("# Signal Seal HQ\nWelcome to the archive.\n")

with open(os.path.join(base_dir, "00 â€“ README + Index", "Archive_Map.md"), "w") as f:
    f.write("# Archive Map\nUse this file to index the archive.\n")

# Create a zip file
zip_filename = "Signal_Seal_HQ_Starter_Kit.zip"
with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_filename, 'w') as zipf:
    for foldername, subfolders, filenames in os.walk(base_dir):
        for filename in filenames:
            file_path = os.path.join(foldername, filename)
            zipf.write(file_path, arcname=os.path.relpath(file_path, base_dir))

zip_filename
